QuestData.Title: While You're Here
QuestData.Description: The Maraudine have raided the Gelkis camps for many years, stealing anything they could get their hands on.$b$bOne of their favorite torments is to take these relics of power which the Gelkis hold sacred, and bring them here to be defiled.$b$bThe Gelkis clan would certainly be grateful if you were to find and destroy these defiled artifacts.
QuestData.LogDescription: You are to scour the Valley of Spears to find 6 Defiled Relics.
QuestData.RewardText: The destruction of those defiled relics will ease the minds of the Gelkis, and will strengthen their resolve.$b$bYou have done well.
